Hello David,

I hope that everything is going well with you and your family.

I trust you will not mind my reiterating on behalf of my clients regarding your inquiry.

Regarding the M/T charter of sugar from Santos to Rotterdam at a minimum laycan buffer of 90 days as per your proposal.

We require 6,000mts to be delivered within 21 days.

We have to seek a quick approval from our internal committee and then only can I provide you with further details of this requirement.

If you require any further details or have any queries on this, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Thank you,
Cherie
